    • Method Detail

      • addToGroup

        private void addToGroup(int rowId,
              int fragmentId,
              int groupId)
        Adds a rowId to a group in a fragment. This method affects only the indices and not the association, so it has to be used carefully while adding the association or manually changing the group.
        Parameters:
        rowId - the row to be added.
        fragmentId - the destination fragment.
        groupId - the destination group.

      • put

      • removeFromGroup

        private void removeFromGroup(java.lang.Object rowId,
                   int fragmentId,
                   int groupId)
        Removes a rowId from a group in a fragment. This method affects only the indices and not the association, so it has to be used carefully while removing the association or manually changing the group.
        Parameters:
        rowId - the row to be removed.
        fragmentId - the source fragment.
        groupId - the source group.

      • remove
